column4: why does my USB mouse lock up in Ubuntu from time to time and replugging it in fixes it?
where would I start....lol ....<---new to ubuntu
Do you know the model number?
You may need to get drivers for it
Well, you might try your mouse maker's website and see if they have the binaries for it. Most binaries come with instructions on how to install them
Is it really that short? Must be an old one...
I can't seem to find it... go to the dell website and try searching all the numbers you can find, and if all else fails, try searching for the product (eg. Dell P990)
I'm not sure. They might. If not, I'll go look through the forums and the wiki to see if I can find anything about mice
Well... search for your mouse type on the forums (http://www.ubuntuforums.com) and see if you can find anything
after some searching it looks liek a very common issue
I see people blaming dell for BIOS problems....which i don't believe it works with XP
Ok, well there you go... did you find a troubleshoot or a walkthrough or anything like that?
I did find where they said using USB hub works and plugging mousing into usb slot on keyboard
I am tryign this first thx for your help
np, if you need anymore help, I should be here for a while longer
Haha, yeah, that happens when you're first learning
